title.narrative: Ensuring minimum basic package of health services at Primary Health Care (PHC) level at most vulnerable areas of South Pyongan, South and North Hwanghae provinces through provision of life-saving drugs and basic equipment

description.narrative: The main objective is to support 270,641 people, in particular women and children, seeking health care in Primary Health Care facilities in each of the 23 counties selected in North Hwanghae, South Hwanghae and South Pyongan provinces. Support will be provided through provision of basic life-saving medical equipment and a basic package of essential medicines, including antibiotics. The project will be implemented over 9 months.

owner-org.narrative: UN OCHA Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)

organisation.narrative: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA)
